events.name: Satanic Salem Walking Tour
events.description: Join our favorite Salem witch as he walks around his haunts and explains a complicated and little known history of how the nations favorite Halloween destination came to be with Thomas O'Brien Vallor of TST Salem

events.name: Michelle Remembers: The Porn Parody
events.description: A live table reading with unreleased illustrations of Lucien Greaves masterpiece

events.name: Hail Nonmonogamy?
events.description: Dresden Visage and Maryline Spicy share their experiences of navigating unconventional relationships by employing Satanic self-empowerment and the Seven Fundamental Tenets.

events.name: Whimsical Blasphemy
events.description: Join Mercy of TST Salem for Music and Videos

events.name: Bats in the Belfry!
events.description: Livestreaming your new best friends, bats from BatWorld. Donate at batworld.org

events.name: Black Nonbelievers: Past, Present and Future
events.description: Noted lecturer, board member of American Atheists and the American Humanist Association and founder of the nonprofit Black Nonbelievers, we are honored to host Mandisa Thomas.

events.name: A Happy Hooven Home: Goats!
events.description: Livestream of goats. Sponsor one of these good kids at woodstocksanctuary.org

events.name: Lupercalia Wolves!
events.description: Livestream of wolves. Donate at nywolf.org

events.name: Late Night Library: Satanic Archives
events.description: TSTVHQ's Satanic Archive Library is open all night. Texts courtesy of Center for Inquiry and Grey Faction.
